answers.text:
Hi Kathleen, 
Thank you for your question on local government safety equipment purchases. Here are a few resources that may help you in answering your question. 
-Wireless Interoperability: A Key Element of Public Safety (http://webapps.icma.org/pm/8504/daley.htm)
- Rising from the Ashes: Lessons Learned from the Southern California Wildfires of 2003 (http://webapps.icma.org/pm/8602/chi.htm)
I hope you find these resources useful as you answer your question! 
Best, 
Robin Saywitz 
ICMA Knowledge Network Intern 
rsaywitz@icma.org

author: Kathleen Higgins
text: The Department of Homeland Security Science & Technology Directorate is trying to determine 1) what types of first responder equipment cities and counties are buying and 2) what their equipment priorities are during the next two budget cycles.  Does anyone know of any recent research on this topic?  If you are involved in procuring emergency response equipment in your city or county, could you share some information?
title: public safety equipment purchases
